name: RandomWanted
description:
Summary:

Just an easy game for random monster concept.

Maybe I will polish it on the future.

Featuring:
  • Keep the wanted one is unique.
  • Random human by several head and face and some colorful fitting.
  • I add collider with them, they will out of frame sometimes, try to using filtering method to find the true one.
Controls:

LMB to identify!!

And R key to restart.

Source:

BGM and ui sound are from Kenney Assets.

Thank you very much and enjoy it.
